page.title: 13FRIDAY - A EUROPEAN LADY
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.30am., I get washed and dressed, wake the two children, Peter and Stephen, then go downstairs to make breakfast. In the meantime my husband gets up. After breakfast the children get ready for school, they usually leave home at about 8.30am. My husband leaves at 8.15am. I feed the dod and tidy round before going to work. My job is as a home help and my first visit is to an old lady of 93. I help her out of bed and get her dressed, and then I go shopping for her. My next visit is to a man near Corporation Park, I also do his shopping. In the afternoon I visit my parents and sometimes go into town shopping. At 3.15pm. I go home to meet the children from school. My husband comes home at 6.30pm. and eats tea on his own
